ValidationRule.description: Require ASC link when Notification Date is entered
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordTypeId = '01237000000N0lp' && ISPICKVAL(X5500_Situation__c, 'Final 5500 Only') && NOT(ISBLANK( Invitation_to_File_Sent__c )) && ISBLANK( ASC_URL_Link_Final__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Enter ASC URL Link in the Final Year section before entering the Notification Date
